params._deployConfig: The deploy configuration of the Hyperdrive pool.
params._extraData: The extra data that contains the pool and sweep targets.

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed ERC4626Hyperdrive Instance.

coreDeployer().notice: The contract used to deploy new instances of Hyperdrive.

deploy((address,address,bytes32,uint256,.notice: Deploys a Hyperdrive instance with the given parameters.

target0Deployer().notice: The contract used to deploy new instances of HyperdriveTarget0.
